column4: hi guys, i have installed vitrualbox to run *.vmdk file in it. But when i start virtual box i gives a error "VBox status code: -1908 (VERR_VM_DRIVER_NOT_INSTALLED).". Can anyone help???
no knowledge, but quess is that you need vmbox host drivers
it says "The vboxdrv kernel module was either not loaded or /dev/vboxdrv was not created for some reason"
